column6: an American named  ANDREW NICHOLAS RIOS
column7: 32 arrived at the Office of Immigration Investigation to ask authorities to help him return after his visa expired.------He came to the Kingdom of Cambodia on 08.05.2018 at the Phnom Penh International Airport for the purpose of working in Cambodia
column8: he was unemployed and his visa expired on 27.01.2019.------He was forwarded to Ponchentong to carry out further proceedings.------PHNOM PENH POLICE
